comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Axel Carl Johan Gustafson (b. c1849) was a Swedish-born writer and temperance activist; married Zadel Barnes Buddington (1841-1917), herself a famous (or infamous) writer, grandmother of Djuna Barnes. Axel Gustafson is best known for his book, The Foundation of Death (1884), about the evils of alcohol. www.famousamericans.net/axelcarljohangustafson/

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I have added the image and Appletons biography to Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axel_Carl_Johan_Gustafson
